mapper.select: SELECT a.CANCEL_NUMBER, a.ORDER_NUMBER, a.CANCEL_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(a.CANCEL_REGDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as CANCEL_REGDATE, a.CANCEL_TITLE, a.CANCEL_CATEGORY,c.goods_name,b.order_state FROM CANCEL a,orderlist b,goods c WHERE a.order_number=b.order_number and b.goods_number=c.goods_number ORDER BY ORDER_NUMBER DESC
